11.content:
"Hmm, this is an interesting spell. I've never seen anything like it!" Twilight Sparkle mumbled to herself as her eyes reached the bottom of the dusty, wrinkled page. The book she was currently reading from was very old, which was obvious from its many ripped pages and horribly stained cover. She had found it in the library's basement, and upon seeing that it was a spell book she decided to give it a try.

"From what I can read its supposed to boost the users magic capabilities! That's amazing, oh the Princess will be so proud when she sees what I can do after this!" Twilight squealed to herself, sounding very similar to a school yard filly. The lavender unicorn quickly went about setting up the spell, which only required a large open space. Since the library was absolutely cluttered in books, she decided that the basement would be a much better alternative. She hummed to herself as she skipped down the stairs, completely unaware that the title of the spell had faded long ago as did much of the description.

Twilight stood in the middle of the mostly empty basement. It was very damp, and a bad stench hung in the air, but the unicorn pushed the thoughts away. She placed the book in the centre of the room and closed her eyes in concentration. The spell was definitely a hard one, but she was sure she could manage, she was the Princess's personal student after all. After a minute of silent concentration, a bright light flashed and her horn began to crackle with an intense magical energy. A few more seconds passed as the light grew brighter and brighter, very soon the magical energy reaching its climax. It exploded in a white light and Twilight was thrown across the room and into the basement wall. She slumped to the ground and sat there for a few moments.

Her eyes fluttered open and she looked around, she didn't feel any different. "Did it work?" She asked herself as she got to her hooves. Her body was unscathed and everything else in the room looked in order. "Maybe if I try using some magic?" She levitated a dozen books of the wall and looked at them with a frown. "What gives?! That spell didn't do anything! Stupid book..." She growled at it before leaving the basement and ascending the stairs. Little did she know, her stomach was already churning and going through a large amount of gastrointestinal distress.

Twilight entered the main room of the library to find it just as she had left. "Well after that disappointment I really could use some cheering up... Maybe I should go see what the others are doing?" After a moment of thinking Twilight decides to go to...
11.title: A Spell Gone Wrong

Pinkie Pie stops her on the way back.
111.content:
"I think I'll go visit Rarity, I remember her saying she was just finishing the last of some big order so she shouldn't be to busy." Twilight said to herself as she stepped outside into the afternoon air. Ponies were everywhere going about their daily business. Pushing through some of the larger crowds she started her way towards Carousel Boutique, which was just a short walk from the library.

A few minutes later Twilight pushed open the door to Carousel Boutique, the sound of bells echoing through the shop as she entered. The first floor was devoid of anypony so she headed up the stairs to the unicorns bedroom/ workshop. "Rarity?" Twilight asked, pushing open another door.

She found Rarity inside her bedroom working on a dress. Hearing her friend, she turned around and smiled. "Twilight! How nice of you to visit! Could you please just wait one second while I finish this dress?"

"No problem Rarity!" Twilight quickly said before pacing over to her. "Is this the last of that order you said you were working on?" She asked as she looked the elegant dress up and down. It was made of red and blue silk, and all along it was embroidered with a variety of sparkling gems.

"Yes actually! This is the very last dress so after this I'll be all done. Good thing to, I've been working non stop for days, I could use a break..." Rarity sighed as she went back to her work. Twilight began pacing around the room and looking at the other dresses while she waited. Suddenly however, she felt a cramp in her stomach and she crouched over in pain. An ominous gurgling filled the air as she placed a hoof on her poor stomach.

Rarity, to caught up in her work, didn't even notice her friends distress. Twilight let out a groan as she felt the cramp move down to her haunches, she then very quickly realized she was about to rip some serious flank. Her best plan of action was to bolt it to the bathroom, but just as soon as she moved the build up of gas was released in a spluttering, wet fart.

Rarity's head snapped up from her dress and turned around to look at her friend practically sprawled out on the floor. Twilight gave her a sheepish grin, her face a very dark shade of red. Before she could say something, Twilight quickly spoke up. "I'm so sorry Rarity! It's just I feel so- ugh..." Another cramp coursed through her body and she collapsed on the ground, flank high in the air. She clenched her eyes shut in pain as she ripped another fart.

Rarity placed a hoof over her nose and frowned in disgust. "Twilight! Please if your going to-" She stopped herself after getting a whiff of the now tainted air and gagged. "Augh, that is absolutely disgusting! Get out!" She snapped at her friend as she pointed a hoof at the door.

Twilight, still a beat red, quickly jumped to her hooves and galloped out of the bedroom. She stormed down the stairs and outside onto the street, releasing farts with every step she took. Oh that was so embarrassing! I don't get it, why am I, Twilight paused her thoughts a moment to let out another rank fart. farting so much? I didn't eat anything that would have upset my stomach... She thought about it, then suddenly the answer hit her like a ton of bricks. That spell! It must have given me all this gas! There must be a way to reverse it, I'm sure the book has a counter spell in it somewhere... Now I just need to get back to the library without anypony noticing this awful gas...

Her vision blurs and in front of her she can see yellow hooves and hear a distorted voice say, "Oh my..." Before succumbing to unconsciousness. Her tail in the air flowing back down behind her rump.

Twilight awakes in Fluttershy's cottage sprawled out upon her back on the couch. The lingering smell from earlier still burning away at her nostrils. She flinches and sits up hoofing away at her muzzle trying to get out that burning sensation, but to no avail.

"What made this horrid smell! It's worse than my gas... Oohh... Speaking of which," Twilight had thought for a moment that her gas subsided, but nope. It was just biding its time. She sprawls out on her tummy and lets her flatulence boom forth. Her tail blowing and smacking against her back from the tremendous built up pressure. Finally, a last few little toots squeak out like rubber toys. Satisfied with her relief she smiles, but grimaces as she slowly wafts her hoof in front of her muzzle, "Better..."

"Yes, I'm fine for the moment. I actually need your help. I have this horrible spell cast on me that won't stop making me fart. I was wondering if you could teach me how to hold in my gas while I'm around others," Twilight asked.

"So what exactly is this stuff?" The cyan coloured pegasus know as Rainbow Dash asked as she turned the small can over in her hooves. "It looks like some sorta spice..." She remarked, looking up to give her pink friend a frown.

Pinkie Pie giggled in her usual, high pitched voice. "It's farting powder Dashie! And we're going to use it in our next prank!" She squealed with a genuine excitement as she snatched the can back. One would have mistook it for a soup can, other then the fact it had no labels and there was a small sealed opening on the top.

A huge grin crossed Rainbow face as she stared at her friend with the same mischievous look she always got when they were about to prank somepony. "Awesome! But who are we gonna get? It's gotta be somepony good, if its just some random pony it won't be that funny..." The two mares stood quiet for a moment in deep thought, thinking just who would be the best choice to prank with their new toy.

"Rarity!" The two mares said simultaneously, both of them wearing mischievous grins as they looked at each other.

Some time later...

"One tea please!" Rarity said to the mare behind the counter in front of her. She smiled back before grabbing a steaming cup from behind her and placing it in front of the white unicorn. She placed a few bits onto the counter before grabbing her cup and leaving the line.

"Ah, nothing like a nice cup of tea to start off the afternoon..." Rarity said to herself as she sat at one of the tables outside of the store. She sat silently, watching the many ponies go by on the street. She was interrupted however, when Pinkie popped out of seemingly nowhere.

"Heya Rarity! How's it going? Nice day we're having isn't it? I hope it doesn't rain later, cause then I'd have to stay inside away from my friends and then I'd be sad..."

The white unicorn stared at her friend for a moment, wondering how best to respond to her seemingly endless rambling. "Uh... right..."

Unbeknownst to Rarity, Rainbow Dash was hovering right behind her, the can of farting power held firmly in her hooves. Making sure that the unicorns back was completely turned, she unsealed the lid and poured some of it into her friend's still steaming tea. It quickly disappeared into the drink and Rainbow smiled as she held a hoof up towards Pinkie Pie.

Pinkie Pie saw the signal then immedaitly cut of their conversation, "Well it was great talking to you Rarity but I gotta go! I er, left the oven on back at the bakery! See you later!" She said quickly before rushing down the street. Rarity merely shrugged and took a sip of her tea, not noticing the dark of fart powder. Angel, being the resilient little bunny he is, still refused to admit just what the leaf was. He shook his head, knowing full aware of what would happen next, and braced himself. Fluttershy gave a disapproving shake of her head, "I've tried asking you nicely, Angel. Why won't you just tell me what that leaf was?" She readied her body with a heavy grunt. The box wouldn't budge. Slowly, Angel began to lose consciousness and started wobbling about on his feet until he gave in and fell on his face. With his eyes half open and his breathing slowed, he raised a front paw to the air and brought it down. He couldn't go anymore. All of his oxygen had been deprived from him. Soon, he blacked out. His leg twitching. Fluttershy didn't realize he had already passed out cold. She had been too busy concentrating and blasting out tons upon tons of huge juicy raunchy farts. They were getting wetter and wetter. Most of them had started sounded like hooves pressing deeply into mud.

With a hind leg raised up high, she let loose one last massive bubbly fart by thrusting her hind leg back down, squeezing it out with pure force. This caused the box she sat on to finally give out to her weight and collapse, causing her to fall plot first onto Angel's back, making a small audible crack. If Angel hadn't been out cold, he would have cried in pain. One thing is for sure. When he finally wakes up, it will mostly likely be with a high pitched whine. Fluttershy stood on all four, and turned back to look at Angel. She never meant for it to lead to this. If only he had told her what that leaf was.

I would do it, of course, but I have a big order I need to get finished by-" her sentence was cut short when she made eye contact with Fluttershy, who was currently resting her plot on top of poor Angel's face, his nose buried deep. 151.content:
"Mr. and Mrs. Cake! I'm back!" Pinkie cheerfully called as she skipped into Sugarcube Corner. She had returned from her break and was ready to get back to work.

"Oh, Pinkie, while you were out, someone who said she was a friend of yours brought a cake for you," Mr. Cake informed Pinkie as she stood behind her usual counter.

"Ooh really what kind? Where is it? But why would they bring a cake? It's not my birthday! Or is it? Did I forget it again? I --" Pinkie's excited speculation was interrupted when she noticed Mr. Cake pointing at a nearby table. She followed his hoof and her jaw dropped when she saw the most delicious looking chocolate cake she had ever seen.

Pinkie Pie ravenously devoured the entire cake in mere seconds. While the cake was delicious, she noticed something peculiar about the taste. It had a vague flavor of something she had eaten before, but she couldn't quite place what it was. She quickly gave up attempting to place what it was when a customer came.

"Hello and welcome to Sugarcube Corner!" Pinkie Pie exclaimed, licking some frosting on the corner of her mouth. "What can I get you today?"

"I need a dozen cupcakes and a --" the stallion began

Pinkie's eyes widened as her stomach gurgled. She figured out what the taste was. She recalled a time Rainbow Dash slipped some farting powder into her milkshake once when she wasn't looking. She remembered how loud, long, and frequent her farts were then and she could she ate a lot more of it this time around. While she and Rainbow found it hilarious, she was aware that many other ponies didn't.

"Did you get all that?" the stallion asked, noticing the blank stare on Pinkie's face. She hadn't paid attention to his order. She was too busy focusing on holding in the painful amount of gas that had quickly developed in her belly.

"Um, Mr. and Mrs. Cake, can I have the rest of the day off?" Pinkie asked.

"What? Why?" Mr. Cake asked.

"No time to explain," Pinkie gulped. She felt like she was about to explode!

"Well you are starting to act a little strange," Mrs. Cake observed. "And you haven't used a sick day in months, so I don't see why not."

"Thanks!" Pinkie exclaimed as she raced for the exit.

She hurried to Rainbow Dash's, uncharacteristically stopping to chat with nopony else along the way.

"Rainbow!" Pinkie called up to her fellow prankster, "Rainbow Dash! Hurry!"

"What is it?" Rainbow Dash asked, landing next to Pinkie. Pinkie pointed her rear at Rainbow and finally let loose.

Rainbow Dash stared at Pinkie's rump in astonishment. This was the loudest she had ever heard Pinkie - or anypony, for that matter - fart! A broad grin had spread across Rainbow's face that widened the longer it lasted, but she was too transfixed by the fart to manage a laugh. Pinkie breathed a heavy sigh of relief and giggled a little before turning back around to face her friend.

"Thanks for the cake!" Pinkie grinned. "You used so much farting powder I'm probably gonna be having good ones like that all week!" She giggled.
151.title: Pinkie Pie

1512.content:
"What cake?" Rainbow asked, clearly perplexed.

"You mean you didn't drop off a delicious chocolate cake with tons of farting powder in it at Sugarcube Corner?" Pinkie asked, equally puzzled. "I could have sworn that prank had 'Dashie' written all over it!"

"If I were going to slip you some farting powder I'd want to be around when it kicks in!" Rainbow assured her.

"But who else knows how much I love to rip flank?" Pinkie asked, sitting on the ground with a thoughtful expression on her face. Rainbow opened her mouth to say something, but was soon interrupted by the deep, loud sound of Pinkie's behind. As the fart increased in length, Pinkie's facial expression changed several times. She started off smirking, but this slowly transformed into a very amused and very proud grin. Eventually, however, the sheer relief she achieved from this fart quickly made itself known, as she closed her eyes and opened her mouth slightly. Once it was over, she laughed profusely.

Rainbow had also made numerous facial expressions during this fart. She started off laughing, but after several seconds her giggling came to a halt. After several seconds, her mouth fell open as well. Even though she had witnessed what farting powder does to her friend (who is already gassy to begin with), she wasn't expecting a fart this long! She was shocked and impressed. After shaking her head in disbelief, she returned to laughing with her friend.

"Pinkie, that was awesome!" Rainbow exclaimed. "I mean, how do you --" Pinkie raised a hoof to gesture her friend to be quiet. Rainbow quickly complied and a series of shorter farts exploded from Pinkie's behind. Rainbow quickly laughed and tried to count how many farts Pinkie had ripped in succession, but after the tenth, they had become so close in succession it was difficult to tell where one ended and one began. It was certainly safe to say, however, that in this brief span of time, Pinkie had farted more times than most ponies do in a day.

Rainbow Dash and Pinkie both fell on their backs, both with tears in their eyes from laughter. When their guffaw came to a halt, Pinkie declared, "I have got to find out who left me that cake! I need to know who to thank for this!"

"Wait right here," Rainbow told Pinkie, "I'm going to ask the Cakes who dropped it off for you. I'll be back in no time!" Rainbow sped off in flight, still smiling at Pinkie's farts. When she returned to Pinkie moments later, she said, "You're not going to believe who they said left you that cake."

"Oh? Who?" Pinkie asked.
1512.title: Rainbow Dash had no idea about the cake

152.content:
Rainbow Dash grinned with excitement when she felt that familiar gurgling in her stomach. She peered down from her cloud, frowning to herself when she realized there weren't going to be any witnesses to this one. She could tell it was going to be huge. PPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTT! a lengthy fart slowly - and quite noisily - made its way out of her rump.

Rainbow Dash began laughing wildly. Being a tomboy, she always found farts hilarious - especially her own! This was one of those days where she had eaten nothing but food that she knew would give her more gas than usual. On these days, she skipped her afternoon nap and instead preferred entertaining herself in that time by listening to her butt.

BBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA APPPPPPPP! An even louder, longer fart shortly followed. It was much deeper in pitch and, to Rainbow's surprise, didn't even seem to smell. She giggled to herself. That one had to have been a record-breaker for her! Her stomach was still rumbling quite violently, churning with gas. Not that Rainbow minded, of course!

She lifted a hind leg, getting ready to let another one rip, but then thought for a second: why not fly somewhere where people can hear her farts? As amusing as she already found them, she always preferred doing it near others. Partly because Rainbow always loved getting recognition for what she's good at but mostly because she always found people's reactions make her farts that much funnier.

Rainbow's belly roared as she soared off, contemplating where to go. On one hoof, she always loved farting near Pinkie Pie because she not only laughed with her but she would often fart as well, which Rainbow liked. The two of them also frequently got into farting contests, which Rainbow always won and she loves winning! On the other hoof, Twilight Sparkle was always fun to prank because she was such an easy target. She hadn't even heard of "pull my hoof" and Rainbow always had it in the back of her mind to show her what it was someday. Of course, Rarity's obsession with all things ladylike lends itself to some of the most amusing annoyed reactions Rainbow had ever seen. She couldn't tell how much longer she could hold this next one in; she had to make her mind up and soon! Where did she go?
152.title: Rainbow Dash

choices: She successfully devised a plan to get Twilight to cast it
She found another magical source of flatulence
She couldn't think of anything so they have to get gas the old fashioned way
1521.content:
"If I'm this gassy, I might as well share it with somepony who loves farting as much as me!" Rainbow Dash thought as she flew to Sugarcube Corner. When she walked inside the bakery, Pinkie Pie was just starting her break.

"Rainbow Dash!" Pinkie Pie cheerfully called when she noticed her friend, "What brings you to Sugarcube Corner today?"

"You, actually." Rainbow Dash answered. "I figured since you're usually on break around this time you might wanna hang out outside." Rainbow Dash suggested. Her stomach loudly gurgled. Pinkie Pie smiled at her, which wasn't unusual considering how Pinkie Pie smiled more often than not. However, this smile had a certain slyness to it that seemed to suggest she heard the gas building up in her friend's belly. Rainbow Dash was tempted to just let it all out right then and there, but the last time she did, the Cakes threatened to ban her from the store for grossing out so many customers, especially after she encouraged Pinkie to join in, who promptly started farting in random ponies' faces.

"Ooh, outside! I love outside! Let's go outside!" Pinkie Pie yammered on in her signature style. "Hey Mr. and Mrs. Cake! I'm going outside!" Pinkie Pie called. She continued ranting, using the word "outside" more times than Rainbow Dash could bother counting before the two made it out the front door.

As usual, the streets of Ponyville were rather empty around this time. Most ponies were either at school or work. The two didn't bother walking that far away from Sugarcube Corner before Rainbow Dash's belly started roaring yet again. "Sounds like you've got a good one brewing in there, Dashie!" Pinkie Pie merrily remarked as she followed closely behind Rainbow Dash. Before Rainbow Dash knew it, she felt something brush up against her butt. Rainbow glanced behind her and saw Pinkie Pie's face with an eager expression on it.

"Enjoying yourself back there?" Rainbow teased.

"I will once you give me something to enjoy, silly!" Pinkie retorted. Ever since their first farting contest, Rainbow Dash noticed Pinkie Pie seems to oddly enjoy receiving farts in her face, sometimes even deliberately getting in positions in which she's staring down Rainbow's business end. Rainbow Dash didn't mind this habit, as she thought it was kind of funny, but she couldn't comprehend why someone would want to smell her farts like that. She just shrugged it off, though. Trying to figure out Pinkie Pie is a lost cause.

"If you want this Sonic Rainboom in your face, be my guest," Rainbow Dash joked, "but don't say I didn't warn you!"

Within seconds, an explosion came from Rainbow Dash's behind. Her fart was so loud that it blew Pinkie Pie's hair back, making it even frizzier than it normally is. It was also incredibly long. Rainbow Dash regretted not timing it. She was sure this one was the longest one she'd ever heard. There were several instances throughout the fart when the gas coming out seemed to slow down and begin sputtering, only to pick up again and start coming back full force, even louder than before!

Naturally, Pinkie Pie laughed uncontrollably throughout the entire fart's duration and for several seconds after it. Rainbow Dash let out a huge sigh of relief. The fart took so much out of her she had to sigh again before she joined Pinkie in their fit of giggles.

"Rainbow Dash, did I ever tell you you're the funniest pony I know?" Pinkie Pie giggled.

"Only every time I do that," Rainbow Dash answered.

"Oh yeah," Pinkie Pie mused, seeming to have forgotten these numerous occasions. "Anyway, I guess that makes it my turn! Mine won't be as good as that, but..." Pinkie turned around. Unlike Pinkie, Rainbow Dash backed away from her friend's butt. She found the sound quite amusing but was never comfortable enough with the smell to have one right in her face like that. Pinkie's fart wasn't anywhere near as loud or as long as Rainbow Dash's, but it was still significantly noisier and lengthier than most farts Rainbow Dash had heard, including some of her own. The two burst into a fit of laughter and took turns farting before they inevitably ran out of gas. The two began walking back toward Sugarcube Corner as Pinkie was getting ready to get back to work.

"Gosh, wouldn't it be great if we never ran out of gas?" Pinkie mused as they walked together. "Of course, I guess that'd be like magic or something"

"Pinkie Pie, you're a genius!" Rainbow Dash exclaimed.

"Why does everyone say that?" Pinkie asked, sounding vexed.

"Why didn't I think of it before? I bet there's some spellbook somewhere that has a spell for that sort of thing. We could get Twilight to cast it on us!"

"And then maybe she can cast it on herself, Applejack, Rarity and Fluttershy and we can have a six way farting contest going!"

"Exactly!" Rainbow Dash smiled.

"Only one problem... how in Equestria could we convince Twilight to cast something like that?"

"Give me some time to think," Rainbow Dash answered, "I'll think of something by the time you get off work."

"Okey dokey lokey," Pinkie Pie replied in a singsong tone as she nonchalantly hopped back into Sugarcube Corner.

Rainbow Dash flew back to the cloud she normally naps on. She thought for a while.
1521.title: To Sugarcube Corner

choices: Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash go elsewhere
They go back on their word and fart on Twilight
15211.content:
Rainbow Dash moved her cloud directly above the Ponyville library, waiting for it to empty. After Spike and Twilight left, Rainbow Dash was delighted to notice they left the door unlocked. She entered the library and directly high tailed it to the magic section.

She read the titles on most of the books, noticing several with obscure subject matter such as Magical Alternatives to Juggling or The Unicorn's Guide to Checkers: It's Only Cheating If You Get Caught. "If they have entire books about stuff like that, somepony somewhere has to have written a fart spell," Rainbow thought. Towards the bottom of the shelf, she noticed a yellow book with a dusty spine. Blowing the dust away, she noticed the bold red font on the spine that read 50 MAGICAL PRANKS.

Rainbow Dash got a good feeling about the book. Glancing at the table of contents, she saw a lot of classic practical jokes with a magical twist, including ones similar to the ones she pulled with Pinkie, such as making regular ink temporarily disappear. She smiled as she read the list of pranks in the book. Unfortunately, however, it didn't seem to have anything related to farts. Then she noticed the table of contents was continued on the next page. She flipped the page and right at the very end, she was grinning widely when she read "Magical Flatulence: Why Settle For A Whoopee Cushion?"

Rainbow Dash did not hesitate for a second. She quickly turned to the page as fast as she could and read on. From the description, the spell could make its target even gassier than Rainbow Dash imagined. The author included a story in which it caused one pony who hadn't eaten anything out of the ordinary to experience its effects for several consecutive hours, producing extraordinary farts every other minute! "That settles it. Twilight is casting this spell on me and Pinkie!" Rainbow Dash thought to herself.

"Twilight would never cast something like that. I'd have to trick her into it somehow. Maybe if I replace the instructions to a spell she's trying to learn with the ones from this... or maybe if I -- " her train of thought was interrupted when the door flew open and in walked Spike and Twilight with pastries from Sugarcube Corner. Rainbow Dash nervously gulped. If she saw the spellbook, she'd recognize the instructions so switching it wouldn't work. It was the only way Rainbow Dash could think to do it, however, so she quickly shut the book and put it back on the shelf.

"Rainbow Dash! What are you doing here?" Twilight Sparkle called, slightly startled. Regaining her composure, she further queried, "And what book is that? I can't imagine what you'd want to read in the magic section..."

"I was just... uh..." came Rainbow Dash's nervous attempt at an explanation. But she couldn't think of one. Twilight started walking closer to the shelf. Rainbow Dash couldn't have Twilight seeing the book! "Uh I was just leaving, I'll catch you later," she said, starting to fly. Rather than flying out the door, however, she deliberately flew into the shelf, sending it and all the books on it crashing to the floor with a heavy {b]THUD! "Oops that wasn't the door! Clumsy me!" She apologized in a nervous tone.

Twilight Sparkle gave her a blank stare as she stood back up from the crash. "How naive do you think I am?" she flatly asked. "Don't you think telling me the truth of what's going on would be a lot easier than sneaking in here, lying to my face, and then filling Pinkie Pie in on your harebrained scheme?"

"...What did Pinkie Pie tell you?" Rainbow Dash sighed, annoyed. How much did she blab?

"She just told me you two are planning something that involves me. She didn't go into the details, though. So, what, may I ask, warrants all this secrecy?"

"How can I put this in a way you will understand?" she thought aloud. "Pinkie Pie and I have a certain... 'interest'," Rainbow Dash began, standing up. Twilight Sparkle cast a spell to lift the bookshelf and began putting books back on the shelf. "This interest of ours is something we think would be even better with magic. But we don't think you'd be into it at all. So I figured the only way we could get help from the best spellcaster in Equestria was to well... trick her into it."

Twilight blushed. "Thank you for the compliment, but you being really vague. What is this interest and what makes you think I'd dislike it so much that I'd refuse to help?"

Rainbow took a deep breath and uttered her one word answer. "Farting."

"...What?" Twilight tilted her head in confusion.

"Pinkie Pie and I love farting," Rainbow Dash reiterated. "We joke about it and have farting contests all the time. We figured that someone like you would think it's weird or gross so we didn't wanna just ask if you could cast a spell to make us really gassy!"

"I'll be honest. I don't understand why someone would think that's so fascinating, but I guess my interest in learning new magic and your interest in... that overlap here." Twilight answered.

"Is this going where I think it's going?" Rainbow Dash asked, picking up on the accommodating tone of Twilight's voice.

"Something I've learned about being a friend is not judging my friends for their interests," Twilight elaborated. "I may think your interest in... that is weird but I'm pretty sure there are a lot of things about me that you'd find weird, so who am I to judge?" She paused, then summarized, "If you two want me to cast that spell, I will. On one condition: just don't, ahem... do that... near me. Deal?"

"Deal!" Rainbow Dash answered without thinking. "Oh, I can't wait to tell Pinkie Pie! Thanks, Twilight, you don't know how much this means to both of us!"

Rainbow Dash sped off, finishing her weather duties for the day as she flew a few celebratory laps around Ponyville. She landed again in front of Sugarcube Corner, where Pinkie Pie was leaving the store after her shift ended. Rainbow Dash filled Pinkie Pie in on her deal with Twilight Sparkle. Pinkie Pie was overjoyed, even by Pinkie standards. The duo rushed back to the library as fast as they could.

Twilight was reading the book at her desk when the two walked in. "Oh, hey, girls, come on in, I think I just about have this spell down," she answered. "You know this spell is simple yet it combines elements from other spells in rather creative ways that -- oh if only you understood magic you'd know what I mean."

Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie stood side by side as Twilight Sparkle cast the spell on them. Soon after, Rainbow Dash felt like she was about to explode! "Did it work?" Twilight asked, seeing Rainbow wince in pain.

"Ugh... yeah! There's definitely a lot of gas in there, alright!" she choked out, doing the best she could to hold it in to stay true to her deal.

"Yeah!" Pinkie grunted, "I never thought anypony could be this gassy, even with magic!"

Rainbow Dash contemplated their next move. She could either go back on her word and experience instant relief from the painful gas there or she could stay true to her word and let it build up even more while the two go somewhere else. Decisions, decisions.
15211.title: Persuading Twilight

152111.content:
"Well, I'd love to stay and chat but if we can't hold this in for long!" Rainbow Dash explained as she started out of the library.

"Thank you so very very much, Twilight!" Pinkie attempted to sound cheerful and enthusiastic as she always does, but it was difficult when she had to hold in the absurd amount of gas she had. "You have no idea how much fun Dashie and I are gonna have with this!"

"Yeah, thanks a lot," Rainbow Dash echoed.

"Don't mention it!" Twilight replied. After a pause, she further stated, "No, really, if anyone asks what made you like... that, don't tell them it was me."

Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie started down the street, which was busy now that work and school were over. Pinkie Pie following incredibly close behind Rainbow Dash, her face mere inches away. Rainbow Dash even felt her face make contact with her rump a couple of times. Many of the ponies gave the two strange looks, but they kept walking.

"So where are we going anyway, Dashie?" Pinkie asked.

"We're gonna get somepony good. Somepony who won't expect it," Rainbow cryptically answered as she led the two further down the road.

As the two walked down the road, Rainbow Dash felt Pinkie Pie extremely close to her butt the whole time. "As much as I love farting, sometimes I think she likes it even more than me," Rainbow thought, knowing the reason why Pinkie Pie chose to walk so close behind her.

She led Pinkie Pie, who was being unusually quiet, down the street. On the way, Rainbow Dash carefully decided which of their friends would make the best first victim. When she finally made her mind up, she came to a stop outside of their friend's place. When she came to a stop, Pinkie Pie apparently wasn't paying attention and she wound up bumping into Rainbow's bottom, almost knocking loose the fart Rainbow Dash had been doing her best to hold in throughout their walk.

"Careful back there! We're here," Rainbow Dash announced, gesturing with a hoof to the building they were outside. Pinkie Pie turned and noticed they were standing directly outside of...
152111.title: A walk down the streets of Ponyville

choices: They continue to fart on her
1521111.content:
"Why hello Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash!" Rarity called as the two entered Carousel Boutique. "I was just closing up," she explained as she put the finishing touches on the dress she was currently designing. "Make yourselves comfortable while you wait," she casually instructed.

"Comfortable, eh?" Rainbow slyly smiled. If there was one thing that was causing her discomfort, it was the flatus incessantly bubbling in her belly. She knew Rarity would never wittingly tell them to fart, but this indirect cue was all that she needed.

She slowly walked toward Rarity, savoring the moment. After a few seconds, Rarity turned away from the dress she was working on and found herself facing Rainbow Dash's backside. Rainbow Dash took this opportunity to rip the biggest fart she could muster - which wasn't difficult in the slightest thanks to Twilight's spell. Her fart was so long that partway through it, Rarity had the time to cast a spell to turn Rainbow Dash around. Her croup wasn't free of faces for long, however; soon after Rarity had cast her spell, Pinkie Pie had taken her usual place in her behind, giggling at the seemingly impossible amount of gas Rainbow Dash had.

As predicted, Rarity was severely annoyed by this. All throughout the fart, she had made disgusted "Ugh" noises and desperately trying in vain to fan away the smell that now filled the room.

"Ahhhh," Rainbow Dash moaned after the insanely lengthy fart came to its end. She wanted to laugh, but the fart and the sigh of relief took all the wind out of her. She merely smiled contently to herself as she watched Pinkie Pie literally roll on the floor laughing.

"Again, Dashie, again!" Pinkie Pie cheered.

"Don't encourage her," Rarity irritably told Pinkie Pie. "And you," she turned her attention to Rainbow Dash. "How could you just... befoul my shop? My home?"

"You told me to make myself comfortable," Rainbow Dash casually responded. "How can I be comfortable when I'm holding that in me?"

"You know I didn't mean --" Rarity began to answer. But Rainbow Dash didn't listen. She was too busy unleashing another extraordinary fart. It was shorter than her previous one (although still quite long when compared to an ordinary fart) but what it lacked in its relative length, it more than made up for in volume. The thunderous fart caused a rumbling sensation in the room. Rarity shook her head and made another disapproving sigh as Pinkie Pie continued to laugh.

By the time Rainbow Dash's fart was over, Rarity's face was red with anger. "If all you're going to do is pass wind, then get out!" she commanded.

"But you haven't heard mine yet!" Pinkie Pie protested, merrily skipping over to Rarity, then turning her back to her.

"GET OUT!" Rarity repeated, enraged.

They contemplated her order for a second. On one hoof, they found her reaction priceless, but on the other hoof, they didn't want to lose a friend over their fart jokes.
1521111.title: Carousel Boutique

15211111.content:
They leave the Boutique, "Wow, Rarity sound upset, what if she doesn't want to be our friend anymore" worried Pinkie. Rainbow Dash felt comfortable that Rarity wasn't really that mad. "Nah, She get over it" said Rainbow. "You think so" said Pinkie Pie. Rainbow just chuckled. "Yeah I sure and plus its just gas, it will pass" said Rainbow as she farted again. Pinkie Pie started gigging. "Yeah, I sure your right" said Rainbow. Then they went off to visited someone else.

Meanwhile at Rarity's Boutique, Rarity was trying to clean the air with an air fresher. She covered her nose with one hoof and was spraying air fresher with the other. "Ugh, I can't believe those two, such immature behavior, Maybe I should just banned them" said Rarity. Then finally after spraying the air, Rarity sniffed the air. "Ah, Much better" said Rarity as she was relief to not to inhale anymore horrid odors. But then she soon realized that her Boutique wasn't yet odor free. She noticed that her latest design have been ruined by Rainbow Dash's stench. Rarity sniffed the designs and gag by smell. "Oh, my perfect designs, they are ruin," said Rarity with sadness. But then sadness turn into anger. "You better watch out Rainbow, I will have my vengeance soon enough." said Rarity with a sinister voice.

Back with Rainbow and Pinkie, They were going to their next victim. "Who was it?"
15211111.title: They leave

choices: Applejack says she could use all the help she can get
Applejack is disgusted by their method of help and kicks them off the farm
152111111.content:
Rainbow Dash eagerly flew to Sweet Apple Acres, Pinkie skipping behind her. When the flatulent duo reached the farm, they saw Applejack working hard as usual. She was bucking apples from trees. Which gave Rainbow Dash an idea.

"Hey Applejack!" Rainbow called as she and Pinkie approached their friend.

"Howdy you two," Applejack greeted in her southern drawl. "I'm afraid I don't have much time for chitchat. Just look at all these apples I have to buck!" Rainbow and Pinkie looked around. Most of the trees in the orchard were full of apples. "It doesn't help that Big Mac's gone and hurt himself again," she grumbled.

"I think we can help you," Rainbow Dash announced. Just when Applejack started to thank her, Rainbow continued, "but let's make this interesting." She walked over to a nearby tree teeming with ripe apples. "Five bits says I can knock all the apples down from this tree without bucking it. Or flying up there and knocking the apples down. Or touching the tree or the apples at all."

Applejack thought for a second, repeating Rainbow Dash's bet conditions under her breath to try to find some sneaky wording Rainbow could possibly exploit as a loophole. "And Pinkie Pie? She won't do anything to the trees or apples either?" She asked.

"She won't. It will be 100% me," Rainbow Dash confirmed.

"Easiest five bits I ever made," Applejack said with a grin.

Smiling, Rainbow Dash began pushing with all her might, resulting in an especially loud fart that initially hurt a little on its way out. Rainbow ignored the awkward feeling in her backside and continued farting as loudly as she could. Though it was no easy feat to produce such a noisy one, even with the help of Twilight's magic, Rainbow Dash heard the sound of apples falling to the ground behind her and smiled when she realized she won the bet.

Rainbow and Pinkie laughed together, both at the fart itself and in surprise that Rainbow actually won the bet. Applejack, on the other hand, merely stared at the blue pegasus with her mouth and eyes wide open. Whether this facial expression was from disbelief, disgust, or amazement, however, Rainbow could not discern.

"Someone owes me five bits!" Rainbow proudly exclaimed as she stopped giggling. As Applejack continued to look at her with a blank stare, Rainbow asked, "Want anymore help? Me and Pinkie might as well do something constructive with all this gas." Pinkie hopped to a nearby tree and, like Rainbow Dash, farted as loudly as she possibly could, knocking apples to the ground. "Good one, Pinkie!" Rainbow chuckled. "So, how about it?"

Applejack finally broke her silence to answer Rainbow's offer.
152111111.title: Applejack

choices: Twilight Sparkle with a message concerning the spell
Rarity, ready to enact her revenge
152111112.content:
Rainbow Dash was snickering to herself as she led them to Fluttershy's cottage. Along the road, Pinkie Pie still followed very closely behind Rainbow Dash. Rainbow farted in Pinkie Pie's face several times as they walked, much to the amusement of both. Some of the ponies they passed along the street got some laughs out of it as well; they hadn't heard anyone fart as long or as often as her.

They were a few feet from Fluttershy's abode when Rainbow Dash realized that Pinkie Pie still hadn't farted since the spell was cast on her. "She must have a really good one built up!" she thought. For the first time since they left Rarity's, Pinkie Pie glanced away from Rainbow's behind and saw where they were. She stopped in place. "What? No, Rainbow Dash, no no no! I told you even our most harmless prank will upset Fluttershy!"

"Come on, Pinkie Pie!" Rainbow Dash urged, "We don't have to do it in her face or anything." Pinkie Pie thought for a second, her hesitant expression looking only slightly more open to the idea. Rainbow Dash sighed as she thought of the perfect thing to convince her. She didn't want to say it but she knew it would be the only thing that would change her mind for sure. "In fact..." she gulped, almost stepping down from her offer. "I came here to let you fart in my face."

Pinkie Pie's eyes widened as her face transfixed back into its usual smile. "Really?" she asked, beaming. Rainbow Dash rolled her eyes and nodded, trying to pretend it was the reason she had brought her there. "Well why didn't you say so!? I'm so glad I've been saving this one up, then!" Pinkie Pie then enthusiastically hopped the remaining distance to Fluttershy's door. She knocked.

Fluttershy opened the door. "Oh, hello Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash. Is there something you want?" she asked in her usual soft voice.

Pinkie Pie opened her mouth to speak several times, but all she could do each time was laugh. "Oh Rainbow Dash, I can't tell her!" Pinkie Pie said while grinning, "let's just show her already!"

"Fine." Rainbow Dash said, reluctant, wondering why she even suggested this in the first place. She walked behind Pinkie Pie and sat down a few inches from her rump.

"A little closer, Rainbow! I can't feel your face in there yet!" Pinkie Pie playfully called.

"She can't be serious," Rainbow Dash thought. Rainbow Dash sighed and scooted as close as she physically could get to Pinkie Pie's rear, her face now making contact with it.

"Um, pardon me, but what are you--?" Fluttershy began while watching their unusual behavior.

"No, pardon me!" Pinkie Pie joked, forcing as much gas as she could out of her rump. It was as loud as - if not louder than - Rainbow Dash's room shaker at Carousel Boutique! Rainbow Dash felt her mane blowing from the wind, much like it does when she flies. The sheer noise the fart made was so amusing that even Rainbow Dash, who didn't want it in her face, couldn't help but laugh at it despite the foul stench making her want to gag. Pinkie Pie seemed determined to make this fart last as long as she could, as it's not every day she gets to fart on Rainbow Dash. When it was over, Rainbow Dash glanced at the clock and saw that over a full minute had passed since the fart began.

Pinkie Pie laughed so hard, she wound up farting again. Which made her laugh harder. Which made her fart again. This pattern kept up for a while, Rainbow Dash laughing with Pinkie after every fart. She certainly seemed to be enjoying Pinkie's farts in her face lot more than she expected.

The whole time Fluttershy gave them a strange look. She didn't seem as grossed out as Rarity, but she certainly didn't seem to find it funny. She seemed more confused than anything. "Um," Fluttershy meekly protested, "my pets have such sensitive ears and noses I think they'd appreciate it if you stopped."

"Okey dokey lokey!" Pinkie Pie agreed, not wanting to put Fluttershy through more than she was comfortable with. "Come on, Rainbow!"

Rainbow Dash stood up. She coughed at the smell that was still strong in her nose and then wordlessly followed Pinkie Pie out of the cottage. The two began walking back toward Ponyville side by side.

"I told you farts are funnier when they're in your face, Dashie!" Pinkie Pie winkingly said, referencing how much more Rainbow Dash had laughed at her farts than usual.

"I do admit, they're louder when you're right next to the source and feeling my mane blow back like that was pretty funny!" Rainbow smiled, reflecting on the fart from a few minutes ago.

"It was hilarious for me too, Dashie!" Pinkie Pie enthusiastically smiled. "I'm usually on the receiving end of these things but it was so fun to unleash my party cannon in your face for once! We're going to have to let me do that to you more often!"

"I dunno, I'm not sure if I liked getting the full force of the smell," Rainbow complained.

"You get used to it," Pinkie Pie assured her.

"If you say so... by the way, Pinkie Pie, did you know that first fart lasted over a minute?" Rainbow Dash said, still in shock at how long the fart lasted. "And that was just that one fart, Celestia knows how long all those others were that kept coming out when we were both laughing our tails off!"

"Looks like with this spell I can finally give you some competition for once!" Pinkie Pie bragged.

"Yeah, but don't get used to it! I got a monster brewing in here!" Rainbow Dash assured Pinkie. Pinkie Pie took her usual spot behind Rainbow Dash, but just before she could try to top Pinkie Pie's super long fart, she was interrupted.

"Wait!" the voice of a certain familiar unicorn called. She stopped and turned to face the source of the voice. It was...
152111112.title: Fluttershy

choices: Her farts are too foul for either Pinkie or Rainbow to laugh at, just as planned
Her plan backfires: Pinkie Pie and Rainbow Dash think it's funny and join in
1521111122.content:
"Oh, hey, Rarity," Rainbow Dash greeted, taking her rump out of her pink friend's face and approaching the unicorn. "You're not mad about earlier, are you?"

"What about earlier?" Rarity asked, looking up with a puzzled expression on her face as if she had forgotten the whole incident. After a moment, her face lit up and she resumed eye contact. "Oh, that! Come now, girls, do you think I'm so petty I'll let a little crude humor stand in the way of our friendship?"

"Ye--" Rainbow began but Pinkie, who was now standing by her side, hoofed her in the side to silence her before she could answer the rhetorical question.

"I admit I find your obsession with bodily functions childish and uncouth, but when I think about it, it's harmless. I just..." Rarity tries to think of something. "Just what!" asked Rainbow, growing impatient. "A surprise." said Rarity. "I like surprises!" Pinkie Pie merrily announced, jumping up and down excitedly. "What are we waiting for?"

Rainbow and Pinkie followed Rarity down the street a little to Carousel Boutique. "After you, girls," Rarity announced, opening the front door with a spell. As soon as she entered, she cast another spell to shut and lock the door.

"So what exactly is this surprise?" Rainbow asked, eying Rarity a little suspiciously when she heard the door lock.

"She can't tell you, silly! Otherwise it wouldn't be a surprise, duh!" Pinkie answered.

"Stand next to each other as close as possible," she instructed. The two did so to the point where they were physically touching. "Now close your eyes," Rarity further instructed. Pinkie immediately did so, but Rainbow shot Rarity a distrusting glance. "Close them, Rainbow Dash, otherwise neither of you get it." Rainbow sighed and did as she said. Even if she was planning at getting back at them, what was the worst that could happen?

There was a couple seconds of silence as they listened to Rarity move around a little. After what felt like an eternity, they heard it: an incredible fart. One that easily rivaled the ones they had been ripping since Twilight cast the spell on them. Rainbow's eyes shot open instantly, watching in disbelief as the usually prim and proper unicorn let this massive one loose.

When the fart reached its conclusion, Rarity explained the obvious, "Twilight Sparkle told me all about that spell she cast on you. I asked her to cast it on me after I told her what you did. Now the two of you are stuck with me till this spell wears off!"

She farted in their faces yet again. This one was fairly short in relation to the ones Pinkie and Rainbow had heard from their own behinds, but it was very loud and filled the room with its smell. Rarity shot the two a very self-satisfied grin as she observed her friends' reactions.
1521111122.title: Rarity, ready to enact her revenge

Rainbow wakes up in the next morning
15211111221.content:
Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie both began coughing and gagging by the strong stench of Rarity’s farts. “Sweet Celista, Rarity that’s smells horrible.” said Rainbow Dash as she covered her nose with her hoof. Rarity gave Rainbow Dash a mischievous grin. “What’s wrong, girls. I thought you didn’t mind passing gas.” said Rarity. Rainbow Dash tries to get up, by using her strength and said. “We don’t, but we didn’t expect it to be so deadly smelling”. “Well, get used to it, because you are staying here until this dreaded spell wears off.” said Rarity as she aims her flank at Rainbow and farts on her. Rainbow continues gagging as she tries to fan the smell with her hoof. “No way, we don’t have to stay here. Right, Pinkie.” said Rainbow to Pinkie Pie. But she discovers that Pinkie has already passed out by the strong smell. “Pinkie!” said Rainbow with horror. “Oh dear, I didn’t think my gas is that powerful.” said Rarity, feeling slightly concern. Rainbow lifts the unconscious Pinkie as she heads to the front door.

When Rainbow Dash tries to open the door, she discovers it was locked. “Hey, Rarity the door is locked. Can you open it.” said Rainbow. Rarity just stares at Rainbow Dash and laughs at her. “What’s so funny?” asked Rainbow. “You didn’t really think, I would leave you unpunished just because Pinkie is knocked out.” said Rarity. “Come on, Rarity. What is with you, you can’t trapped us like this.” said Rainbow. “Yes, I can.” Said Rarity evilly, as she then levitated a small silver key with her magic. The key caught Rainbow’s attention. “Hey, that must be the key to the front door.” said Rainbow. Rarity puts the key behind her. “Whatever do you mean, darling?” said Rarity, pretending to not know. “Nice try, Rarity. Now give me that key.” said Rainbow as she attempts to grab the key. But Rainbow ends up getting farted on by Rarity again. Rainbow started gagging again as her vision became blurry by Rarity’s flatulence. Rarity then runs away, with the key still with her. Rainbow regains her sight and follows Rarity.

After a few moments of chasing each other, Rainbow manages to trap Rarity in a dead end. “Ha Ha, gotcha now.” taunted Rainbow. Rarity whimpered with fear as Rainbow gave her a satisfied grin. Then, when all of a sudden Rainbow Dash heard a slight chuckle from Rarity. “You just won’t give up.” said Rarity. “Huh?” said Rainbow, confused. “The reason why I’m doing this is because you and Pinkie befouled my home and also many of my latest designs” said Rarity. Rainbow gave Rarity a sheepish grin. “Heh Heh, sorry.” said Rainbow. “Well, I’m glad you apologize. But you are still punish for doing it any way.” said Rarity. “Come on, Rarity. Can’t you just let this one slide.” pled Rainbow. “Nope, my mind is made up.” Rainbow growled with frustration. “So might as well make yourself comfortable, and I also hiding this key in a safe place as well.” said Rarity as she galloped away. Rainbow follows her and said “Go ahead, I would find it eventually.” When Rarity heard this she turned around and said “Well, if you’re going to be like that. Then I guess you lead me no choice.” Then without hesitation, Rarity puts the key in her mouth and swallows it. Rainbow gasped with shock as the key went through Rarity’s esophagus and into her stomach. “Noo! What are you doing!” shouted Rainbow as she tackled Rarity to the ground. “Spit out the key, I mean it.” Shouted Rainbow with rage. Rarity used her magic to make Rainbow get off her. “Stop it, There will not be any rough housing in my boutique." said Rarity. “Are you insane, you just swallowed the key.” Shouted Rainbow. “Yes, I did” said Rarity, calmly. “Why?” asked Rainbow. “Calm down, darling. At least it now in a safe place.” Said Rarity as she giggled and rubbed her stomach. “Wait, what do we do now?” asked Rainbow. “Well, my suggestion would be to wait and let nature takes it course.” Said Rarity. “Very funny.” Said Rainbow, not amused. “Well, it might take a while. So let’s make the best of it.” Said Rarity as she walked away. Rainbow then had a sly look in her face and decides to strike. “Not if I have anything to do about.” Said Rainbow as she was about to tackled Rarity again. But Rarity stopped her as she once again farts on her face. Rainbow collapses to the ground, defeated. Rarity just chuckled and said “Please, don’t try me. As long as the spell is still effect and the key is in my stomach, you are going to be here for a long time. Sorry about that.” Rarity then walks away, with Rainbow Dash on the floor being unconscious.

What happens next?

Rainbow awoke, still feeling incredibly gassy. Pinkie was unconscious on the floor next to her, but whether she fell unconscious from the thick smell that still lingered or if she was merely sleeping was difficult to tell.

Much to the duo's frustration, however, most of the windows they came across had crossbeams, were too small for either of them to fit through, or were otherwise unable to use as an escape path. Once they reached the kitchen, however, they were in for a change of pace.

15212.content:
Rainbow Dash flew to the Ponyville library. She nervously gulped before knocking.

"Oh, hi, Rainbow Dash, what brings you here today?" Twilight Sparkle asked.

"Twilight, you know that even though I make fun of you sometimes for being an egghead, I think your magic is totally awesome, right?"

"...Yes?" Twilight responded, unsure of what to make of this rare compliment from Rainbow Dash.

"And you know that when you were testing that flight spell that backfired a few weeks back, I totally caught you and you still owe me one, right?"

Twilight sighed. "What do you want, Rainbow Dash?"

"See, Pinkie and I were wondering if you knew a spell that could make us, well... gassy."

"What?" Twilight Sparkle asked, blankly staring at Rainbow Dash.

"We really love farting," Rainbow Dash explained. "We were hoping that maybe you knew a spell that could give us a lot of gas."

"I don't know a spell like that," Twilight answered. "And even if I did I wouldn't cast it on you because... ew!"

"You're lucky I'm out of gas now or I'd give you something to 'ew' about!" Rainbow Dash retorted, annoyed at Twilight's remark.

"If you weren't out of gas you wouldn't be here asking me to cast you a spell to make you flatulent," Twilight pointed out.

"Whatever. I'd stay but I'm gonna go find a way to get super gassy," Rainbow announced, "and when I do, I'm going to fart on you." Rainbow Dash turned to leave, but took a couple steps back first. She posed in a way that heavily emphasized her rump and pointed it at Twilight. "Next time you see this butt, it's going to be so full of gas you won't be able to breathe!" Rainbow threatened.

"You are clearly the portrait of maturity," Twilight sarcastically scoffed.

Rainbow ignored this comment as she stood back upright and ran off, smirking to herself as she daydreamed about farting nonstop in Twilight's face. "It's one thing to not like fart jokes," she thought, "but if you're going to be judgmental about it, you deserve a few big ones in your face! Anyway, time for plan B." Rainbow flew through the Everfree Forest and stepped inside Zecora's hut.

"Zecora, Twilight sent me because she has this problem that's too embarrassing for her to go out." Rainbow lied.

"Twilight Sparkle is feeling bad? Oh this news is rather sad," Zecora rhymed.

"Don't worry, she's not sick or anything," Rainbow continued, "but she is extremely gassy," Rainbow continued to spin her tale. "Like... she keeps having these super loud and long ones every other minute. I asked her if she ate anything out of the ordinary and she said she had something in the Everfree Forest but couldn't remember what it was. She was hoping you'd know what it was and if there's anything that can settle her stomach," Rainbow said, finishing her fib.

"I have heard of this red fruit. All who eat it start to toot. It resembles a cherry. It is called the gasberry. It grows northwest of here, but you should stay clear. To reverse the effects of this strange food -- " but before she could complete the rhyme, Rainbow Dash had already left the hut.

After flying a short distance in the direction Zecora described, Rainbow Dash found several bushes blossoming with ripe gasberries. She gathered all she could carry and flew back to her cloud. She squeezed in a short nap and had a dream about ripping the longest fart of her life in Twilight's face. She was a little disappointed when she awoke to find out it was a dream, but was still amused at the thought and prepared to make it a reality. She eyed the berries near her, tempted to eat every last one of them.

Before she could give into the temptation, Pinkie came merrily skipping along. "Rainbow Da-ash!" she called in her typical sing-song voice, "did Twilight know that spell we wanted?"

"No," Rainbow answered, flying down from her cloud and standing next to her friend while carrying a small hoofful of the berries, "but I found out about these berries that are supposed to make us super gassy. The best part is if they work, I know where they grow and there is plenty more where they came from. Ready to eat some?" she asked.

Pinkie thought for a moment. "You know what I think would be fun?" she smiled, "Getting the others in on this! I can throw a party and make some punch with these berries and before the girls even know it, we'll be having our own little fart party!"

"Pinkie Pie, you're a genius!" Rainbow repeated. "But I wonder if we have enough berries to make that work..."
15212.title: She found another magical source of flatulence

choices: They forgive Rainbow and keep the party going
They're decide to leave; Twilight kicks Rainbow and Pinkie out of her home.
152121.content:
"You know where they grow," Pinkie chimed in a singsong tone that emphasized the rhyme. "We can get more than enough to whip up a batch big enough for all six of us!"

"Yeah, but how am I gonna carry them all?" Rainbow wondered aloud. "It wasn't exactly easy carrying the few I've already got."

"Leave that to me," Pinkie insisted. "Wait here a sec." Pinkie skipped along the dirt road to Sweet Apple Acres.

When Pinkie was out of sight, Rainbow looked at their current collection of gasberries. "If I'm gonna be getting more of these things, I'd better make sure they actually work," she pondered. She ate one, not knowing what to expect. The sweet, somewhat sour taste reminded Rainbow of raspberries. "Hey, these aren't too bad," Rainbow thought, shoving another into her mouth. Then another. Before she knew it, the berries in her hooves were gone. She flew back to her cloud and gobbled down the rest of the berries, licking the juice from her lips. "Those were delicious!" she thought, landing back on the ground. "Although, I don't really feel any different. Maybe Zecora lied. Or maybe I just got the wrong berries."

Pinkie Pie walked back into view, this time with an empty bushel on her back. "Here you go, Rainbow," Pinkie said, again, singing the rhyming phrase.

Rainbow sighed, ready to update Pinkie on her lack of gas. "Listen, Pinkie, I --" she began. But she was interrupted by a very loud gurgle from her belly. Rainbow Dash moaned in discomfort. She had so much gas she was in pain! Pinkie dropped the bushel and rushed behind Rainbow Dash as fast as she could.

BBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM MFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!

Rainbow's fart was extraordinary in all regards. After already going on for several seconds, she heard Pinkie deeply sniffing the gas between fits of giggles. "Keep going, Dashie!" Pinkie cheered, "This one's a real stinker!" Rainbow never understood why Pinkie found the smell so funny, but these kinds of remarks would always make her smile mid-fart. It especially made her smile knowing they were going to be extra smelly for Twilight when she'd make good on her promise! Toward the end of the fart, it began to sound much deeper and louder, prompting Pinkie to laugh even harder.

When this sprawling burst of gas came to an end, Rainbow wanted to laugh, but she couldn't. She was too busy sighing in relief and catching her breath. She finally caught a whiff of the smell and Pinkie certainly wasn't lying. She proudly grinned. She didn't like the smell of other ponies' farts, but she could definitely appreciate her own! She finally started to laugh when she heard Pinkie still sniffing the air near her behind. Her laughter was short-lived, as she forced out a shorter, but still loud and foul fart when she heard Pinkie inhaling.

"This is going to be the best party ever!" Pinkie enthusiastically giggled.

Rainbow nodded in agreement while chuckling. She picked up the bushel and was ready to go to the Everfree forest. Before she took off, she smiled and said, "Hey, Pinkie, check this out! Up up and away!" After the 'away' she took flight. She farted the instant she took off and circled around Pinkie Pie a few times, encompassing her friend in a thick cloud of her gas. Pinkie fell to the ground laughing when this fart was over, but Rainbow fluttered closer to the ground, hovering with her butt just over Pinkie's face. Rainbow inhaled deeply, then all of a sudden...

PPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!

"Aahhhh," Rainbow deeply sighed before joining Pinkie in a hearty guffaw. Still laughing, she flew back to the Everfree Forest.

"Hurry back with those berries!" Pinkie called between laughs, "I wanna fart just like that!"

She backtracked to the bushes and began loading the bushel up with gasberries, occasionally stopping to fart. When it was half full, her competitive spirit started to rear its head, "You know... if everypony's gonna be super gassy, I need to be super-mega-ultra-hyper gassy! One for them," she said dropping a gasberry in the bushel, "one for me," she said popping another into her mouth. When the bushel was full, she ate a few more on the bush she had been picking and flew back to Ponyville, her belly roaring with gas now that the other gasberries were starting to take effect.

Pinkie's window was open so rather than lugging the bushel of flatulent food up the stairs, she decided to just fly in.

"Hi again, Rainbow Dash!" Pinkie greeted, "the party's gonna be at the library if that's alright!"

"That's perfect," Rainbow smiled while setting the bushel down, still looking forward to getting her revenge on Twilight.

"Oh, wow, you didn't need to fill it, Dashie," Pinkie added, noticing how many gasberries she had picked, "that's gonna be way more than enough. I guess we can eat the leftovers at the party," she thought aloud. "So... meet us at the library in two hours," Pinkie said.

Rainbow flew back to her home and decided to take another nap before the party. When she awoke, she realized she nearly overslept and arrived at the library just when it started. A bowl of punch and a larger bowl of the leftover gasberries sat on a table in the corner.

"Something about this party seems... unusual," Rarity declared. "It's rather tame for a Pinkie Pie party,"

"Yeah, Pinkie, where's the party cannon?" Applejack half-joked.

"I got your 'party cannon' right here!" Rainbow boasted with a wink as she entered the room. She flew next to Twilight, who was just about to be the first to take a sip of the punch.

"Rainbow Dash, please don't tell me you actually --" Twilight Sparkle began. Before she could finish this sentence, however, Rainbow turned around and forced out yet another extremely powerful fart. Twilight cast a spell to teleport a few feet away, but Rainbow Dash followed her, still farting. Twilight tried teleporting away yet again, but made the mistake of teleporting next to Pinkie. Just when she was going to cast her spell again, Pinkie grabbed Twilight's horn and interrupted the spell. "Pinkie, let go!" Twilight begged.

"Nah," Pinkie declined as her flatulent friend caught up again. Rainbow ended her current fart and again, put her rump in Twilight's face. Twilight struggled to break free from Pinkie's grasp, but the earth pony was too strong for her. The other three friends just looked at each other confused, unsure of what was going on and whether they should interfere.

Rainbow released a torrent of short, gassy bursts until it caused Twilight to gag. Just when she heart Twilight was about to inhale, she lifted a hind leg and proudly smiled.

BBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPP PPPPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFRRRRRRRRRRTTTTT!!!

This long, deep, growling fart caused a rumbling sensation throughout the entire room. Partway through, Pinkie began laughing so hard, she let go of Twilight's horn, allowing her to teleport away. She made up for this mistake by leaning into her friend's behind, Her revenge on Twilight may have been a little shorter than she would have liked, but at least she was still farting in somepony's face.

"I don't see why you'd want to be away from this, Twilight!" Pinkie laughed as Rainbow's fart came to a halt. She inhaled the air deeply as Rainbow, again, was too out of breath to giggle, herself.

"If Rainbow Dash is just going to continue being rude, I think I can speak for the rest of us when I say this party is over!" Rarity declared.

"Yes," Fluttershy agreed.

Twilight tried to say something but wound up coughing as soon as she opened her mouth; the smell was still lingering in her nose.

"It ain't really a party without y'all," Applejack said.

"Wait!" Pinkie exclaimed, finally stepping away from Rainbow's behind, "You haven't even had any punch yet! It's a new recipe and I think you'll really like it!" Pinkie said, trying to save the party. "Plus I don't think Rainbow has anything left in her. Do you, Dashie?"

"Are you kidding? I'm just getting st--" Rainbow began. Pinkie tapped her with her hoof. "I mean, yeah. Sorry about that, I guess I got a little carried away. But you don't have to worry about it for the rest of the party, trust me."

The four ponies looked at each other trying to decide what to make of this.
152121.title: Fart Party!

choices: They decide to have fun with it
1521211.content:
"Girls," Twilight announced, finally done choking on the foul smell, "I don't think Rainbow would have done that if I hadn't provoked her earlier."

"What do you mean?" Applejack asked.

"Earlier, Rainbow Dash came by and asked if I knew a spell that would make her extraordinarily flatulent," Twilight explained. "Rather than simply telling her I didn't know such a spell, I was a little harsh about her interest in such a spell," Twilight explained. "While I admit, I still don't exactly understand it, she and Pinkie seem to have some fun with it," she said as Pinkie giggled and took another whiff of the air near Rainbow Dash's rump. "Who are we to judge what they do in their spare time? Sure, I'm sure I speak for the rest of us when I say we wouldn't want her doing that in our faces, but if it's what Rainbow and Pinkie like to do when we're not around, more power to them. It's not like it hurts anypony or anything."

Pinkie's face lit up, when she saw her opportunity. "Sounds like somepony learned about friendship!" She smiled as she rushed to the punch bowel and poured six glasses of the gassy drink, surprisingly managing to carry all six at once. She gave all of her friends a glass and kept one for herself. "To friendship!" She exclaimed, raising her glass in a toast.

"To friendship!" Rainbow, Twilight, Rarity, Applejack, and Fluttershy chorused before drinking the punch.

"Pinkie, this punch is simply divine!" Rarity complimented.

"It's delicious," Fluttershy nodded in agreement.

"Yeah," Applejack concurred, "you've really outdone yourself this time, Pinkie!"

"We should have this punch at every party," Twilight assented.

"We totally should!" Rainbow winked at Pinkie.

"Thanks!" Pinkie replied with a smile, "there's plenty more if you want a refill!"

After a few minutes and a couple more glasses of punch, the flatulent effects of the drink began to show. A look of discomfort spread across everypony's face.

"Pinkie, how much longer am I gonna have to hold this in?" Rainbow whispered to Pinkie in the corner. She was still significantly gassier than all the other ponies, thanks to all the berries she had eaten earlier in addition to the punch. "I feel like I'm about to explode!"

"Just wait a bit," Pinkie whispered, pointing at Fluttershy, who was wincing in her struggle to hold in her gas.

"Girls... I'm not feeling so well," Fluttershy meekly panted, clearly uncomfortable. "Maybe I should just--" she began, but she was unable to contain it any longer. Fluttershy blushed at the loud noise that had come out of her.

"Wow, Fluttershy, I never knew ya had it in ya!" Applejack joked. "Try topping this one!" Applejack raised a hind leg and unabashedly ripped a long, deep fart of her own.

"Really?" Rarity asked, sounding disgusted, "You want to turn that into a contest? How uncouth!"

"We're all clearly full of gas right now," Applejack stated, gesturing to all her friends who were clearly struggling to hold in their flatulence. "We might as well try to make the best of it," she added.

"I disagree," Rarity said, "we need to find a remedy for this. This amount of... ugh, gas... is simply not natural!"

"You can't be serious," Applejack rolled her eyes. "It's perfectly natural and the only way to get rid of it is to let it out."

Their argument raged on for a little longer until they finally asked the other girls what they should do. What do they decide?
1521211.title: They forgive Rainbow and keep the party going

choices: The gasberries' effect worsens, expanding on the amount of gas they already have
They all ran out of gas.
15212112.content:
"Why don't we all fart together? It'll be fun!" Pinkie Pie suggested, while farting.

"EWW! You can't be serious!" Rarity said, feeling disgusted at this.

"Rarity is right. I'm not in the mood for farting." Twilight replied, with a groan in her belly following soon after.

Applejack suddenly farted on Rarity's face without warning, the fart being boisterous and stinky, with Rainbow Dash then farting on Twilight's face also, except that it was much worse than Applejack's; it was very long, deep pitched but gradually rising in pitch, and it stunk horribly, filling most of the library with her gas.

"Oh, it's on now!" Rarity said as she proceeded to fart loudly at Applejack, with a silent fart for good measure.

"Don't mind if I join in?" Twilight said, enjoying this quite a bit. She farted for four seconds towards Rainbow Dash, followed by Pinkie Pie happily farting at Twilight's face. "Hey!" Shouted Twilight as a response to this.

The mane six were all happily enjoying the stench of the flatulence-filled library, and their farts.

Unexpectedly, Fluttershy let out a puff of gas at Twilight. It was so rotten that she passed out, which Rainbow Dash hadn't planned out exactly.

But then...
